alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Blue Mountains of Washington (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 14 at 9:57AM PST until January 14 at 2:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... ...FREEZING FOG ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In Washington, Foothills of the Blue Mountains of Washington. In Oregon, Lower Columbia Basin of Oregon. * WHEN...Until 2 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility and potential frost on bridges.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Blue Mountains of Washington
